name: dimensions. (GuiTheDev)
description:
I only joined the Jam when there were only 3 daus left, its very crunched and there are bugs, its more of a proof of concept

Controls:

WASD for movement

Pull out Portal Gun with F(When holding portalGun you cant move)

Make Portal with Q(you can only make portal when holding portalGun)

Remove Portal with X(you can only remove portal when holding portalGun)

Art: Not me(i forgot where i took it from, il put them here later)

Music: Me

Scripting: Me

Ideas: Me
